name: Bulbasaur
desc: A small, dual-type Pokémon known for the plant bulb on its back.

name: Ivysaur
desc: The evolved form of Bulbasaur, it has a larger plant bulb.

name: Venusaur
desc: The final evolution of Bulbasaur, it becomes a powerful dual-type Pokémon.

name: Charmander
desc: A small, fire-type Pokémon with a flame at the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
desc: The evolved form of Charmander, it has a fiercer appearance.

name: Charizard
desc: A powerful fire and flying-type Pokémon with both Mega X and Mega Y forms.

name: Squirtle
desc: A small, turtle-like Pokémon known for its water abilities.

name: Wartortle
desc: The evolved form of Squirtle, it has more developed water-based skills.

name: Blastoise
desc: The final evolution of Squirtle, it becomes a powerful water-type Pokémon.

name: Caterpie
desc: A small, worm-like Pokémon often found in forests.

name: Metapod
desc: The evolved form of Caterpie, it has a protective shell.

name: Butterfree
desc: A butterfly-like Pokémon known for its graceful flying.

name: Weedle
desc: A small, caterpillar-like Pokémon with a poisonous stinger.

name: Kakuna
desc: The evolved form of Weedle, it has a hard cocoon-like shell.

name: Beedrill
desc: A bee-like Pokémon known for its speed and stinging attacks.

name: Pidgey
desc: A small bird Pokémon often found in forests.

name: Pidgeotto
desc: The evolved form of Pidgey, it has stronger flying abilities.

name: Pidgeot
desc: A powerful bird Pokémon known for its majestic appearance.

name: Spearow
desc: A small bird Pokémon known for its sharp beak and quick movements.

name: Fearow
desc: The evolved form of Spearow, it has a longer beak and more powerful wings.

name: Ekans
desc: A snake-like Pokémon known for its coiled body and venomous bite.

name: Arbok
desc: A serpent-like Pokémon with a hood and a venomous bite.

name: Pikachu
desc: A small, electric mouse Pokémon known for its lightning abilities.

name: Raichu
desc: The evolved form of Pikachu, it has enhanced electrical powers.

name: Sandshrew
desc: A small, mouse-like Pokémon with a sand-covered body.

name: Sandslash
desc: The evolved form of Sandshrew, it has sharp, sand-covered claws.

name: Nidoran ♀
desc: A female Nidoran known for its poison abilities.

name: Nidorina
desc: The evolved form of Nidoran ♀, it has a calm and nurturing nature.

name: Nidoqueen
desc: A powerful, queen-like Pokémon with both poison and ground abilities.

name: Nidoran ♂
desc: A male Nidoran known for its poison abilities.

name: Nidorino
desc: The evolved form of Nidoran ♂, it is known for its aggression.

name: Nidoking
desc: A powerful king-like Pokémon with both poison and ground abilities.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: A cute, singing Pokémon known for putting others to sleep with its song.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: The evolved form of Jigglypuff, it has a larger and rounder body.

name: Zubat
desc: A bat-like Pokémon known for its echolocation abilities.

name: Golbat
desc: The evolved form of Zubat, it has a larger wingspan.

name: Oddish
desc: A plant-like Pokémon known for its leaves and sweet scent.

name: Gloom
desc: The evolved form of Oddish, it has a droopy appearance and emits a foul odor.

name: Vileplume
desc: A flower-like Pokémon known for its vivid colors and toxic spores.

name: Diglett
desc: A small, mole-like Pokémon known for burrowing underground.

name: Dugtrio
desc: The evolved form of Diglett, it has three heads and can create tunnels.

name: Psyduck
desc: A duck-like Pokémon known for its psychic headaches.

name: Golduck
desc: The evolved form of Psyduck, it has strong psychic abilities and is an adept swimmer.

name: Poliwag
desc: A tadpole-like Pokémon with a swirl pattern on its belly.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: The evolved form of Poliwag, it has more developed swimming skills.

name: Poliwrath
desc: A powerful Pokémon with water and fighting abilities. It is known for its martial arts skills.

name: Abra
desc: A psychic Pokémon with the ability to teleport short distances.

name: Kadabra
desc: The evolved form of Abra, it possesses strong psychic powers and wields a silver spoon.

name: Alakazam
desc: A psychic Pokémon known for its high intelligence and telekinetic abilities.

name: Machop
desc: A muscular Pokémon in the early stages of development, it has great physical strength.

name: Machoke
desc: The evolved form of Machop, it is known for its impressive muscles.

name: Machamp
desc: A four-armed Pokémon with incredible power and martial arts skills.

name: Bellsprout
desc: A plant-like Pokémon with a long vine that it uses to ensnare prey.

name: Weepinbell
desc: The evolved form of Bellsprout, it has a gaping mouth filled with toxins.

name: Victreebel
desc: A large, predatory plant Pokémon known for its deadly jaws and vines.

name: Tentacool
desc: A jellyfish-like Pokémon that drifts in the ocean currents.

name: Tentacruel
desc: The evolved form of Tentacool, it has long, poisonous tentacles.

name: Geodude
desc: A rock and ground Pokémon with rocky arms and a strong body.

name: Graveler
desc: The evolved form of Geodude, it has more powerful limbs and can roll at high speeds.

name: Golem
desc: A colossal, rock-skinned Pokémon known for its incredible strength.

name: Slowpoke
desc: A slow-moving Pokémon with psychic abilities. It often daydreams and forgets things.

name: Slowbro
desc: The evolved form of Slowpoke, it has a Shellder attached to its tail, enhancing its psychic powers.

name: Magnemite
desc: A magnet Pokémon with electromagnetic properties. It can attach to metal objects.

name: Magneton
desc: The evolved form of Magnemite, it is composed of three Magnemite linked by strong magnetic forces.

name: Farfetch'd
desc: A duck-like Pokémon known for wielding a leek like a sword in battle.

name: Doduo
desc: A two-headed, flightless bird Pokémon known for its speed and agility.

name: Dodrio
desc: The evolved form of Doduo, it has three heads and can run at high speeds.

name: Shellder
desc: A bivalve Pokémon with a hard shell. It clamps onto rocks and uses its tongue to catch prey.

name: Cloyster
desc: The evolved form of Shellder, it has a protective shell and can launch spikes as projectiles.

name: Gastly
desc: A ghostly Pokémon that can pass through walls. It often plays pranks on people.

name: Haunter
desc: The evolved form of Gastly, it haunts old buildings and loves to frighten travelers.

name: Gengar
desc: A mischievous ghost Pokémon known for its cunning and ability to slip into the shadows.

name: Onix
desc: A serpentine Pokémon made of rock. It digs tunnels through the ground.

name: Voltorb
desc: A round, electric Pokémon that can explode if disturbed. It often hides in power plants.

name: Electrode
desc: The evolved form of Voltorb, it is highly charged and can cause massive explosions.

name: Exeggcute
desc: A group of psychic eggs that communicate via telepathy. They often gather in clusters.

name: Exeggutor
desc: The evolved form of Exeggcute, it has a tall neck and can summon psychic powers.

name: Cubone
desc: A small Pokémon that wears a skull as a mask. It is known for its attachment to its mother's skull.

name: Marowak
desc: The evolved form of Cubone, it wields a bone as a weapon and is protective of its kin.

name: Lickitung
desc: A Pokémon with an extremely long tongue. It uses its tongue to sense its surroundings.

name: Rhyhorn
desc: A powerful and armored Pokémon with a drill-like horn on its nose.

name: Rhydon
desc: The evolved form of Rhyhorn, it can run through rocky mountains at high speeds.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: A motherly Pokémon that carries its young in its pouch. It is fiercely protective of its offspring.

name: Horsea
desc: A small, seahorse-like Pokémon that uses its fin to swim gracefully in the ocean.

name: Seadra
desc: The evolved form of Horsea, it has a spiky fin and can shoot powerful jets of water.

name: Goldeen
desc: A beautiful, golden fish Pokémon known for its elegant swimming in rivers and ponds.

name: Seaking
desc: The evolved form of Goldeen, it is a powerful swimmer and is often considered a symbol of beauty.

name: Staryu
desc: A star-shaped Pokémon that can regenerate lost limbs. It is often found in the deep sea.

name: Starmie
desc: The evolved form of Staryu, it has powerful psychic abilities and can fly through the water.

name: Mr. Mime
desc: A playful Pokémon known for miming and creating invisible barriers for protection.

name: Scyther
desc: A swift, mantis-like Pokémon with scythe-like blades for arms. It is an agile hunter.

name: Jynx
desc: A humanoid Pokémon known for its graceful movements and its ability to put others to sleep.

name: Pinsir
desc: A powerful, beetle-like Pokémon with enormous pincers. Its Mega Evolution gains the power of flight.

name: Tauros
desc: A wild bull Pokémon known for its fierce temperament and charging attacks.

name: Magikarp
desc: A weak and floppy fish Pokémon that is often underestimated. It can evolve into Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
desc: A fearsome sea serpent Pokémon that can cause destructive storms. Its Mega Evolution gains a Dark type.

name: Lapras
desc: A gentle giant of the sea known for carrying people on its back across frigid waters.

name: Ditto
desc: A shape-shifting Pokémon with the ability to transform into any other Pokémon it encounters.

name: Eevee
desc: A unique Pokémon with multiple evolution options. It is known for its adaptability.

name: Vaporeon
desc: One of Eevee's evolutions, it can melt into water and make its body disappear.

name: Jolteon
desc: One of Eevee's evolutions, it has sharp fur and can discharge powerful electric shocks.

name: Flareon
desc: One of Eevee's evolutions, it has a fiery mane and can generate intense heat.

name: Aerodactyl
desc: A prehistoric, flying Pokémon known for its sharp fangs and incredible speed. It has a Mega Evolution.

name: Snorlax
desc: A massive and sleepy Pokémon that blocks paths with its enormous body.

name: Articuno
desc: A legendary bird Pokémon that can freeze the atmosphere with its icy wings.

name: Zapdos
desc: A legendary bird Pokémon with control over electricity. It can summon lightning storms.

name: Moltres
desc: A legendary bird Pokémon associated with fire. It can create blazing infernos.

name: Dratini
desc: A small, serpentine Pokémon known for its gentle and shy nature.

name: Dragonair
desc: The elegant evolved form of Dratini, it has long, serpentine wings.

name: Dragonite
desc: A powerful and friendly dragon Pokémon known for its ability to fly at high speeds.

name: Mewtwo
desc: A genetically engineered psychic Pokémon with immense psychic powers. It has two Mega Evolutions.

name: Sentret
desc: A curious and watchful Pokémon that stands on its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

name: Furret
desc: A long, slender Pokémon that can stretch its body to search for food or burrow into the ground.

name: Hoothoot
desc: A nocturnal owl Pokémon known for its keen sense of time. It hoots at precise intervals.

name: Noctowl
desc: The evolved form of Hoothoot, it has superior night vision and can rotate its head 180 degrees.

name: Ledyba
desc: A friendly ladybug Pokémon known for its helpful nature. It is often seen in gardens.

name: Ledian
desc: The evolved form of Ledyba, it has powerful wings and can create beautiful star patterns in the sky.

name: Spinarak
desc: A spider Pokémon known for spinning intricate webs to catch prey.

name: Ariados
desc: A large spider Pokémon that uses its sharp fangs and webs to capture prey.

name: Crobat
desc: The evolved form of Golbat, it is incredibly fast and can fly silently through the night.

name: Chinchou
desc: A lantern Pokémon with light-producing organs on its head. It is known for guiding sailors.

name: Lanturn
desc: The evolved form of Chinchou, it can emit bright light from its antenna and illuminate the ocean floor.

name: Pichu
desc: A baby Pikachu Pokémon known for its playful and mischievous nature. It is the pre-evolution of Pikachu.

name: Igglybuff
desc: A baby Jigglypuff Pokémon known for its cute appearance and soothing lullabies.

name: Mareep
desc: A fluffy, electric sheep Pokémon known for the wool on its body that can store static electricity.

name: Flaaffy
desc: An electric Pokémon with a coat of soft, fluffy wool. It can generate electrical energy.

name: Ampharos
desc: A dragon-like electric Pokémon with a mega-evolution. Its light-up tail can be seen from afar.

name: Bellossom
desc: A beautiful flower Pokémon that evolves from Gloom when exposed to a Sun Stone.

name: Marill
desc: A water and fairy-type Pokémon known for its rubbery, blue body and its ability to bounce on its tail.

name: Azumarill
desc: The evolved form of Marill, it is known for its powerful Aqua Jet move and cheerful disposition.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: A tree mimic Pokémon that stands still like a tree to avoid being attacked. It dislikes water.

name: Politoed
desc: The evolved form of Poliwhirl when exposed to a King's Rock. It is said to bring rain.

name: Hoppip
desc: A lightweight seed Pokémon that can be carried away by the wind. It floats using its leafy hat.

name: Skiploom
desc: The evolved form of Hoppip, it soars through the sky while remaining connected to the ground by its roots.

name: Jumpluff
desc: A cottonweed Pokémon with the ability to glide on the wind. It spreads its fluffy spores.

name: Yanma
desc: A fast-flying Pokémon with large, transparent wings. It can see in all directions without moving its eyes.

name: Wooper
desc: A water and ground-type Pokémon that can live on land or in water. It has a simple, cheerful disposition.

name: Quagsire
desc: The evolved form of Wooper, it is known for its laid-back and carefree nature.

name: Espeon
desc: A psychic-type Pokémon that evolves from Eevee when leveled up with high friendship during the day.

name: Umbreon
desc: A dark-type Pokémon that evolves from Eevee when leveled up with high friendship during the night.

name: Murkrow
desc: A mischievous crow Pokémon known for its fondness for shiny objects.

name: Slowking
desc: The evolved form of Slowpoke when a Shellder bites its head. It is highly intelligent.

name: Wobbuffet
desc: A patient and defensive Pokémon known for its ability to reflect damage back at its foes.

name: Dunsparce
desc: A serpentine Pokémon known for its burrowing abilities. It has a drill-like tail.

name: Gligar
desc: A bat-like Pokémon that glides silently through the night. It can poison foes with its stinger.

name: Steelix
desc: A colossal steel and ground-type Pokémon known for its powerful jaws and immense strength.

name: Snubbull
desc: A pink, bulldog Pokémon known for its tough appearance. It has a gentle disposition.

name: Granbull
desc: The evolved form of Snubbull, it is fiercely protective of its territory and loved ones.

name: Qwilfish
desc: A spiky water and poison-type Pokémon with the ability to shoot poisonous quills from its body.

name: Scizor
desc: A bug and steel-type Pokémon with a sleek, red exoskeleton. Its mega-evolution enhances its power.

name: Shuckle
desc: A slow-moving bug and rock-type Pokémon known for its extremely high defensive capabilities.

name: Heracross
desc: A bug and fighting-type Pokémon with a powerful horn. Its mega-evolution boosts its strength.

name: Sneasel
desc: A dark and ice-type Pokémon with sharp claws. It is known for its sneaky and agile nature.

name: Teddiursa
desc: A bear-like, normal-type Pokémon with a jovial disposition and a crescent moon mark on its forehead.

name: Ursaring
desc: The evolved form of Teddiursa, it is known for its intimidating presence and formidable strength.

name: Slugma
desc: A fire-type Pokémon that resembles a molten rock. It moves slowly and emits intense heat.

name: Magcargo
desc: A fire and rock-type Pokémon with a shell made of hardened magma. Its body is extremely hot.

name: Swinub
desc: An ice and ground-type Pokémon with a pig-like appearance. It loves to dig in the ground.

name: Piloswine
desc: The evolved form of Swinub, it has two large tusks and is highly adapted to cold environments.

name: Corsola
desc: A water and rock-type Pokémon known for its coral-like appearance. It can regenerate its branches.

name: Remoraid
desc: A fish-like water-type Pokémon that can shoot water from its mouth with great accuracy.

name: Octillery
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its long, flexible tentacles and its ability to shoot ink.

name: Delibird
desc: A festive ice and flying-type Pokémon that delivers gifts to trainers during the holiday season.

name: Mantine
desc: A graceful water and flying-type Pokémon known for gliding through the ocean with its large wings.

name: Skarmory
desc: A steel and flying-type Pokémon with sharp wings and a strong sense of territoriality.

name: Houndour
desc: A dark and fire-type Pokémon known for its keen sense of smell and fiery breath.

name: Houndoom
desc: A dark and fire-type Pokémon with a sinister appearance. Its mega-evolution enhances its power.

name: Kingdra
desc: A water and dragon-type Pokémon known for its powerful water-based attacks and regal appearance.

name: Smeargle
desc: A normal-type Pokémon with the unique ability to learn and mimic the moves of other Pokémon.

name: Smoochum
desc: A cute and playful ice and psychic-type Pokémon known for its charming appearance.

name: Miltank
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its strong and nutritious milk production.

name: Larvitar
desc: A rock and ground-type Pokémon with a tough outer shell. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Pupitar
desc: The second stage in Larvitar's evolutionary line, Pupitar has a chrysalis-like appearance.

name: Tyranitar
desc: A powerful rock and dark-type Pokémon known for its imposing size and strength. Its mega-evolution enhances its power further.

name: Poochyena
desc: A dark-type Pokémon resembling a hyena, known for its sharp fangs and pack mentality.

name: Mightyena
desc: The evolved form of Poochyena, Mightyena is a dark-type Pokémon with heightened aggression and power.

name: Zigzagoon
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its zigzag pattern and mischievous behavior.

name: Linoone
desc: The evolved form of Zigzagoon, Linoone is a fast and agile normal-type Pokémon.

name: Lotad
desc: A water and grass-type Pokémon resembling a small lily pad. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Lombre
desc: The second stage in Lotad's evolutionary line, Lombre has a humanoid appearance with a sombrero-like lily pad on its head.

name: Ludicolo
desc: The final stage in Lotad's evolutionary line, Ludicolo is a dancing water and grass-type Pokémon known for its joyful nature.

name: Taillow
desc: A small bird Pokémon with normal and flying types. It is known for its swift flight and sharp beak.

name: Swellow
desc: The evolved form of Taillow, Swellow is a graceful bird Pokémon with strong flying abilities.

name: Wingull
desc: A water and flying-type Pokémon that is often seen near bodies of water. It can dive for prey in the ocean.

name: Pelipper
desc: A water and flying-type Pokémon known for its large beak, which it uses to scoop up fish from the ocean.

name: Ralts
desc: A small and timid psychic and fairy-type Pokémon known for its psychic abilities.

name: Kirlia
desc: The evolved form of Ralts, Kirlia continues to develop its psychic powers and gains gracefulness.

name: Gardevoir
desc: A powerful and elegant psychic and fairy-type Pokémon. Its mega-evolution enhances its psychic abilities further.

name: Surskit
desc: A bug and water-type Pokémon known for its graceful skating on the surface of ponds and lakes.

name: Masquerain
desc: A bug and flying-type Pokémon known for its beautiful appearance and graceful flight.

name: Nincada
desc: A bug and ground-type Pokémon with a dual nature. It can evolve into two different forms.

name: Ninjask
desc: A bug and flying-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed. It is one of the forms Nincada can evolve into.

name: Shedinja
desc: A mysterious bug and ghost-type Pokémon that emerges when Nincada evolves into Ninjask. It has a unique ability.

name: Whismur
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its timid and quiet nature. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Loudred
desc: The second stage in Whismur's evolutionary line, Loudred is known for its loud vocalizations.

name: Exploud
desc: The final stage in Whismur's evolutionary line, Exploud has a powerful voice and can create shockwaves with its cries.

name: Makuhita
desc: A fighting-type Pokémon known for its training and dedication to become stronger.

name: Hariyama
desc: The evolved form of Makuhita, Hariyama is a powerful and imposing fighting-type Pokémon.

name: Azurill
desc: A normal and fairy-type Pokémon known for its round body and cheerful personality.

name: Nosepass
desc: A rock-type Pokémon with a magnetic nose. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Skitty
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its playful and cute behavior. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Delcatty
desc: The evolved form of Skitty, Delcatty is a graceful and charming normal-type Pokémon.

name: Sableye
desc: A dark and ghost-type Pokémon with a gemstone in its body. Its mega-evolution enhances its abilities.

name: Mawile
desc: A steel and fairy-type Pokémon known for its powerful jaws and ability to mega-evolve for increased strength.

name: Aron
desc: A steel and rock-type Pokémon known for its hard and durable body. It is the first stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Lairon
desc: The second stage in Aron's evolutionary line, Lairon has a formidable defense and metallic body.

name: Aggron
desc: A steel and rock-type Pokémon known for its massive size and formidable strength. Its mega-evolution enhances its defensive abilities.

name: Meditite
desc: A dual-type fighting and psychic Pokémon known for its meditation and focus.

name: Medicham
desc: A fighting and psychic-type Pokémon that can mega-evolve for increased power.

name: Electrike
desc: An electric-type Pokémon known for its speed and energy.

name: Manectric
desc: An electric-type Pokémon that can mega-evolve to become even more electrifying.

name: Plusle
desc: An electric-type Pokémon known for its positive energy and ability to generate electricity.

name: Minun
desc: An electric-type Pokémon known for its negative energy and ability to discharge electricity.

name: Volbeat
desc: A bug-type Pokémon known for its illuminating patterns used in courtship dances.

name: Illumise
desc: A bug-type Pokémon known for its graceful and captivating courtship dances.

name: Roselia
desc: A dual-type grass and poison Pokémon known for its beautiful roses and thorny vines.

name: Gulpin
desc: A poison-type Pokémon with a large mouth that can swallow almost anything.

name: Swalot
desc: A poison-type Pokémon known for its voracious appetite and ability to swallow things whole.

name: Carvanha
desc: A dual-type water and dark Pokémon known for its sharp teeth and aggressive nature.

name: Sharpedo
desc: A water and dark-type Pokémon that can mega-evolve into a more menacing form.

name: Wailmer
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its large size and playful nature.

name: Wailord
desc: A massive water-type Pokémon that is one of the largest in the Pokémon world.

name: Torkoal
desc: A fire-type Pokémon known for its high body temperature and coal-based abilities.

name: Spoink
desc: A psychic-type Pokémon known for its bouncing movements and reliance on its pearl.

name: Grumpig
desc: A psychic-type Pokémon known for its intelligence and psychic abilities.

name: Spinda
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its unique spot patterns, which vary from individual to individual.

name: Trapinch
desc: A ground-type Pokémon known for its large jaws and burrowing abilities.

name: Vibrava
desc: A dual-type ground and dragon Pokémon that is part of the Flygon evolutionary line.

name: Flygon
desc: A powerful ground and dragon-type Pokémon known for its ability to create sandstorms.

name: Swablu
desc: A dual-type normal and flying Pokémon known for its soft and fluffy feathers.

name: Altaria
desc: A dual-type dragon and flying Pokémon known for its graceful appearance and the ability to mega-evolve.

name: Zangoose
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its sharp claws and rivalry with Seviper.

name: Seviper
desc: A poison-type Pokémon known for its serpentine appearance and rivalry with Zangoose.

name: Lunatone
desc: A dual-type rock and psychic Pokémon known for its connection to the moon.

name: Solrock
desc: A dual-type rock and psychic Pokémon known for its connection to the sun.

name: Barboach
desc: A dual-type water and ground Pokémon known for its whiskers and barbels.

name: Whiscash
desc: A water and ground-type Pokémon known for its large size and whiskers.

name: Corphish
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its pincers and aquatic nature.

name: Crawdaunt
desc: A dual-type water and dark Pokémon known for its aggressive and predatory behavior.

name: Kecleon
desc: A normal-type Pokémon known for its ability to change colors and blend into its surroundings.

name: Shuppet
desc: A ghost-type Pokémon known for its mischievous and playful nature.

name: Banette
desc: A ghost-type Pokémon that can mega-evolve into a more menacing form.

name: Chimecho
desc: A psychic-type Pokémon known for its soothing chime-like sounds.

name: Absol
desc: A dark-type Pokémon that can mega-evolve into a more powerful form.

name: Wynaut
desc: A psychic-type Pokémon known for its cheerful and curious disposition.

name: Clamperl
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its clam-like appearance and pearl-like orbs.

name: Huntail
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its sharp fangs and hunting skills.

name: Gorebyss
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its graceful appearance and long, ribbon-like fins.

name: Relicanth
desc: A dual-type water and rock Pokémon known for its ancient origins.

name: Luvdisc
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its heart-shaped body and associations with love.

name: Bagon
desc: A dragon-type Pokémon known for its ambition to one day fly.

name: Shelgon
desc: A dragon-type Pokémon that protects itself within a tough shell.

name: Salamence
desc: A dragon and flying-type Pokémon known for its fearsome power and ability to mega-evolve.

name: Starly
desc: A dual-type normal and flying Pokémon known for its early appearances in the Pokémon world.

name: Staravia
desc: A dual-type normal and flying Pokémon that evolves from Starly.

name: Staraptor
desc: Staraptor is a powerful Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its impressive speed and strong wings. It is often seen soaring through the skies in search of prey.

name: Bidoof
desc: Bidoof is a small, beaver-like Pokémon that is often associated with dams and waterways. It has a friendly and industrious nature.

name: Bibarel
desc: Bibarel is the evolved form of Bidoof. It is a Water/Normal-type Pokémon known for its strong teeth, which it uses to cut down trees and build dams.

name: Budew
desc: Budew is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon that resembles a bud. It is known for its cute appearance and the pleasant aroma it emits.

name: Roserade
desc: Roserade is the evolved form of Roselia. It is a Poison/Grass-type Pokémon that uses the flowers on its hands to release toxic spores and create dazzling displays.

forms.name: Burmy Plant
forms.desc: Burmy in its Plant Cloak form resembles a small plant. It uses leaves and other plant materials to blend into its surroundings.

forms.name: Burmy Sandy
forms.desc: Burmy in its Sandy Cloak form covers itself in sandy particles for camouflage. It is well-suited to desert environments.

forms.name: Burmy Trash
forms.desc: Burmy in its Trash Cloak form conceals itself under a layer of trash and debris. It can be found in urban areas.

forms.name: Wormadam Plant
forms.desc: Wormadam in its Plant Cloak form has a grassy exterior. It uses its cloaked appearance to blend in with foliage.

forms.name: Wormadam Sandy
forms.desc: Wormadam in its Sandy Cloak form takes on a sandy appearance. It prefers arid landscapes.

forms.name: Wormadam Trash
forms.desc: Wormadam in its Trash Cloak form covers itself with metallic debris. It's often found in areas with a lot of industrial waste.

name: Mothim
desc: Mothim is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon. It is the male counterpart to Wormadam and is known for its elegant and butterfly-like appearance.

name: Combee
desc: Combee is a small Bug/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a bee. It is often seen collecting nectar from flowers.

name: Vespiquen
desc: Vespiquen is the evolved form of Combee and is known as the Beehive Pokémon. It is the queen bee of its colony and commands a swarm of Combee.

name: Pachirisu
desc: Pachirisu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its cute and fluffy appearance. It is native to the Sinnoh region.

name: Buizel
desc: Buizel is a Water-type Pokémon with a sleek and aquatic design. It is a skilled swimmer and uses its flotation sacs to stay afloat.

name: Floatzel
desc: Floatzel is the evolved form of Buizel. It is known for its incredible swimming speed and agility in the water.

name: Drifloon
desc: Drifloon is a Ghost/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a floating balloon. It is said to carry away children who mistake it for a regular balloon.

name: Drifblim
desc: Drifblim is the evolved form of Drifloon. It is a larger, balloon-like Pokémon that can carry people and other Pokémon into the sky.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ominous appearance and leadership of a gang of Murkrow. It is a symbol of bad luck in some cultures.

name: Chingling
desc: Chingling is a small Psychic-type Pokémon known for the chime-like sounds it produces. It often appears in peaceful and serene environments.

name: Stunky
desc: Stunky is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon with a distinct foul odor. It uses its scent to deter predators and can spray a noxious gas when threatened.

name: Skuntank
desc: Skuntank is the evolved form of Stunky. It has a more menacing appearance and can release a potent spray of foul-smelling liquid as a defense mechanism.

name: Bonsly
desc: Bonsly is a Rock-type Pokémon that resembles a small bonsai tree. It is known for mimicking a tree to avoid being targeted by predators.

name: Mime Jr.
desc: Mime Jr. is a Psychic/Fairy-type Pokémon and the pre-evolved form of Mr. Mime. It enjoys performing and miming, often using invisible props.

name: Chatot
desc: Chatot is a unique Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to mimic human speech and sounds. It can be found in tropical regions.

name: Gible
desc: Gible is a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon and the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its love of digging and creating tunnels.

name: Gabite
desc: Gabite is the evolved form of Gible and retains its passion for digging. It is a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon with powerful jaws.

forms.name: Garchomp
forms.desc: Garchomp is a powerful Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed and ferocious appearance. It's a formidable opponent in battles.

forms.name: Garchomp Mega
forms.desc: Mega Garchomp is an even more fearsome version of Garchomp. Its Mega Evolution enhances its strength and abilities, making it a force to be reckoned with.

name: Munchlax
desc: Munchlax is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its insatiable appetite. It often eats large quantities of food and then takes long naps.

name: Riolu
desc: Riolu is a Fighting-type Pokémon with a strong sense of justice. It is the pre-evolved form of Lucario and possesses the potential to evolve into it.

forms.name: Lucario
forms.desc: Lucario is a powerful Fighting/Steel-type Pokémon with a strong sense of justice. It can sense auras and is a skilled martial artist.

forms.name: Lucario Mega
forms.desc: Mega Lucario is the Mega Evolution of Lucario. Its aura-sensing abilities are enhanced, and it becomes an even more formidable fighter.

name: Hippopotas
desc: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its sandy appearance. It is often found in desert regions and can create sandstorms.

forms.name: Hippowdon
forms.desc: Hippowdon is a large and powerful Ground-type Pokémon that can control sandstorms. It is known for its immense strength and durability.

forms.name: Hippowdon
forms.desc: Female Hippowdon is distinguished by its slightly different appearance and is also capable of controlling sandstorms like its male counterpart.

name: Skorupi
desc: Skorupi is a small Poison/Bug-type Pokémon that is known for its stinging tail. It is often found in arid and desert-like environments.

name: Drapion
desc: Drapion is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon known for its menacing appearance and powerful pincers. It is a formidable predator in its habitat.

name: Croagunk
desc: Croagunk is a Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon with toxic skin. It uses its poison to defend against threats and is known for its unique croaking sound.

name: Toxicroak
desc: Toxicroak is the evolved form of Croagunk and is a Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon. It has powerful punching abilities and secretes even deadlier toxins.

name: Carnivine
desc: Carnivine is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its large mouth filled with sharp teeth. It is a carnivorous plant that traps prey with its vines.

name: Mantyke
desc: Mantyke is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a manta ray. It often forms schools and gracefully glides through the ocean waters.

name: Snover
desc: Snover is a Grass/Ice-type Pokémon that resembles a small snow-covered tree. It is often found in snowy mountainous regions.

forms.name: Abomasnow
forms.desc: Abomasnow is a Grass/Ice-type Pokémon known for its large tree-like appearance. It is often associated with snowy landscapes.

forms.name: Abomasnow Mega
forms.desc: Mega Abomasnow is the Mega Evolution of Abomasnow. Its size and power increase significantly, and it controls blizzards with ease.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a Dark/Ice-type Pokémon known for its agility and sharp claws. It is a skilled hunter in icy environments.

name: Magnezone
desc: Magnezone is an Electric/Steel-type Pokémon that evolves from Magneton in areas with strong magnetic fields. It has powerful electromagnetic abilities.

name: Lickilicky
desc: Lickilicky is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its long tongue, which it uses to eat anything in its path. It has a voracious appetite.

name: Rhyperior
desc: Rhyperior is a Ground/Rock-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Rhydon. It has immense strength and is known for its powerful drill arms.

name: Yanmega
desc: Yanmega is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed and agility in flight. It is often found near bodies of water.

name: Leafeon
desc: Leafeon is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its lush and leafy appearance. It evolves from Eevee when exposed to a Leaf Stone.

name: Glaceon
desc: Glaceon is an Ice-type Pokémon that evolves from Eevee when exposed to an Ice Stone. It has a frosty and crystalline appearance.

name: Gliscor
desc: Gliscor is a Ground/Flying-type Pokémon known for its bat-like appearance and acrobatic abilities. It often hides in caves during the day.

name: Mamoswine
desc: Mamoswine is an Ice/Ground-type Pokémon known for its rugged and powerful build. It is adapted to cold environments and can traverse snowy terrain.

forms.name: Gallade
forms.desc: Gallade is a Psychic/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its chivalrous nature and sword-like arms. It is a noble and honorable fighter.

forms.name: Gallade Mega
forms.desc: Mega Gallade is the Mega Evolution of Gallade. Its psychic powers and combat skills are enhanced, and it becomes an even more valiant protector.

name: Probopass
desc: Probopass is a Rock/Steel-type Pokémon known for its distinctive appearance, including a large magnetic nose. It has strong magnetic powers.

forms.name: Rotom
forms.desc: Rotom is an Electric/Ghost-type Pokémon known for its ability to possess and animate electrical appliances. It is mischievous in nature.

forms.name: Rotom Fan
forms.desc: Rotom Fan is one of the forms of Rotom, known for taking the form of an electric fan. It can generate powerful gusts of wind.

forms.name: Rotom Frost
forms.desc: Rotom Frost is a form of Rotom that takes on the appearance of a refrigerator. It can lower temperatures and freeze objects.

forms.name: Rotom Heat
forms.desc: Rotom Heat is a form of Rotom resembling a microwave oven. It can generate intense heat and flames.

forms.name: Rotom Mow
forms.desc: Rotom Mow is a form of Rotom that takes on the appearance of a lawnmower. It is capable of mowing down grass and plants.

forms.name: Rotom Wash
forms.desc: Rotom Wash is a form of Rotom resembling a washing machine. It can create powerful water currents and wash objects.

name: Patrat
desc: Patrat is a small Normal type Pokémon known for its keen observation skills.

name: Watchog
desc: Watchog is the evolved form of Patrat and is also a Normal type Pokémon.

name: Purrloin
desc: Purrloin is a mischievous Dark type Pokémon with a cunning nature.

name: Liepard
desc: Liepard is the evolved form of Purrloin and is known for its swiftness.

name: Pansage
desc: Pansage is a Grass type Pokémon resembling a simian creature.

name: Simisage
desc: Simisage is the evolved form of Pansage and is known for its lush foliage.

name: Pansear
desc: Pansear is a Fire type Pokémon with a flaming tail.

name: Simisear
desc: Simisear is the evolved form of Pansear and has control over flames.

name: Panpour
desc: Panpour is a Water type Pokémon known for its love of swimming.

name: Simipour
desc: Simipour is the evolved form of Panpour and is an excellent swimmer.

name: Roggenrola
desc: Roggenrola is a Rock type Pokémon with a sturdy body.

name: Boldore
desc: Boldore is the evolved form of Roggenrola and has powerful limbs.

name: Gigalith
desc: Gigalith is the final evolution of Roggenrola and is known for its durability.

name: Woobat
desc: Woobat is a Psychic and Flying type Pokémon with a heart-shaped nose.

name: Swoobat
desc: Swoobat is the evolved form of Woobat and emits ultrasonic waves.

forms.name: Audino
forms.desc: Audino is a Normal type Pokémon known for its healing abilities.

forms.name: Audino Mega
forms.desc: Mega Audino gains Fairy type and becomes even more adept at healing.

name: Timburr
desc: Timburr is a Fighting type Pokémon that carries a wooden log.

name: Gurdurr
desc: Gurdurr is the evolved form of Timburr and is known for its strength.

name: Conkeldurr
desc: Conkeldurr is the final evolution of Timburr and wields concrete pillars.

name: Throh
desc: Throh is a Fighting type Pokémon skilled in Judo techniques.

name: Sawk
desc: Sawk is a Fighting type Pokémon known for its swift kicks.

name: Venipede
desc: Venipede is a Bug and Poison type Pokémon with poisonous spines.

name: Whirlipede
desc: Whirlipede is the evolved form of Venipede and rolls into a defensive ball.

name: Scolipede
desc: Scolipede is the final evolution of Venipede and is a fast and agile attacker.

forms.name: Basculin
forms.desc: Basculin is a Water type Pokémon known for its aggressive behavior.

forms.name: Basculin
forms.desc: Blue-striped Basculin is a regional variant with a different appearance.

name: Sandile
desc: Sandile is a Ground and Dark type Pokémon known for its cunning nature.

name: Krokorok
desc: Krokorok is the evolved form of Sandile and has a keen sense of smell.

name: Krookodile
desc: Krookodile is the final evolution of Sandile and is a fearsome predator.

name: Dwebble
desc: Dwebble is a Bug and Rock type Pokémon that hides in a sturdy shell.

name: Crustle
desc: Crustle is the evolved form of Dwebble and carries a massive boulder on its back.

name: Scraggy
desc: Scraggy is a Dark and Fighting type Pokémon known for its baggy skin.

name: Scrafty
desc: Scrafty is the evolved form of Scraggy and uses its saggy pants as a weapon.

name: Sigilyph
desc: Sigilyph is a Psychic and Flying type Pokémon with mysterious patterns.

name: Trubbish
desc: Trubbish is a Poison type Pokémon that resembles a garbage bag.

name: Garbodor
desc: Garbodor is the evolved form of Trubbish and emits a foul odor.

name: Zorua
desc: Zorua is a mischievous Dark type Pokémon known for its illusion abilities.

name: Zoroark
desc: Zoroark is the final evolution of Zorua and can create illusions at will.

name: Gothita
desc: Gothita is a Psychic type Pokémon with a love for predicting the future.

name: Gothorita
desc: Gothorita is the evolved form of Gothita and is known for its calm demeanor.

name: Gothitelle
desc: Gothitelle is the final evolution of Gothita and has powerful psychic abilities.

name: Solosis
desc: Solosis is a Psychic type Pokémon known for its gel-like body.

name: Duosion
desc: Duosion is the evolved form of Solosis and is highly intelligent.

name: Reuniclus
desc: Reuniclus is the final evolution of Solosis and has powerful psychic powers.

name: Ducklett
desc: Ducklett is a Water and Flying type Pokémon that loves to swim.

name: Swanna
desc: Swanna is the evolved form of Ducklett and is an elegant swimmer.

name: Vanillite
desc: Vanillite is an Ice type Pokémon that resembles an ice cream cone.

name: Vanillish
desc: Vanillish is the evolved form of Vanillite and can create freezing gusts.

name: Vanilluxe
desc: Vanilluxe is the final evolution of Vanillite and has powerful ice abilities.

name: Emolga
desc: Emolga is an Electric and Flying type Pokémon known for its adorable appearance.

name: Karrablast
desc: Karrablast is a Bug type Pokémon that has a hard shell.

name: Escavalier
desc: Escavalier is the evolved form of Karrablast and is heavily armored.

name: Foongus
desc: Foongus is a Grass and Poison type Pokémon that resembles a mushroom.

name: Amoonguss
desc: Amoonguss is the evolved form of Foongus and releases toxic spores.

name: Alomomola
desc: Alomomola is a Water type Pokémon known for its healing abilities.

name: Ferroseed
desc: Ferroseed is a Grass and Steel type Pokémon with sharp spikes.

name: Ferrothorn
desc: Ferrothorn is the evolved form of Ferroseed and is a formidable tank.

name: Litwick
desc: Litwick is a Ghost and Fire type Pokémon known for leading travelers astray.

name: Lampent
desc: Lampent is the evolved form of Litwick and is said to guide spirits.

name: Chandelure
desc: Chandelure is the final evolution of Litwick and has a mystical presence.

name: Axew
desc: Axew is a Dragon type Pokémon known for its strong tusks.

name: Fraxure
desc: Fraxure is a Dragon type Pokémon known for its sharp tusks.

name: Haxorus
desc: Haxorus is the final evolution of Fraxure and has powerful jaw strength.

name: Cubchoo
desc: Cubchoo is an Ice type Pokémon that constantly suffers from runny noses.

name: Beartic
desc: Beartic is the evolved form of Cubchoo and is a formidable ice bear.

name: Cryogonal
desc: Cryogonal is an Ice type Pokémon with a unique crystalline structure.

name: Shelmet
desc: Shelmet is a Bug type Pokémon known for its helmet-like shell.

name: Accelgor
desc: Accelgor is the evolved form of Shelmet and is incredibly fast.

name: Stunfisk
desc: Stunfisk is a Ground and Electric type Pokémon that hides in the ground.

name: Mienfoo
desc: Mienfoo is a Fighting type Pokémon known for its martial arts skills.

name: Mienshao
desc: Mienshao is the evolved form of Mienfoo and is a master of fighting.

name: Druddigon
desc: Druddigon is a Dragon type Pokémon known for its jagged scales.

name: Golett
desc: Golett is a Ground and Ghost type Pokémon with mysterious origins.

name: Golurk
desc: Golurk is the evolved form of Golett and is a giant, ancient golem.

name: Pawniard
desc: Pawniard is a Dark and Steel type Pokémon known for its sharp blades.

name: Bisharp
desc: Bisharp is the evolved form of Pawniard and is a skilled tactician.

name: Heatmor
desc: Heatmor is a Fire type Pokémon known for its fiery appetite.

name: Durant
desc: Durant is a Bug and Steel type Pokémon that lives in underground colonies.

name: Deino
desc: Deino is a Dark and Dragon type Pokémon with a blindfold-like skin.

name: Zweilous
desc: Zweilous is the evolved form of Deino and has two heads that rarely get along.

name: Hydreigon
desc: Hydreigon is the final evolution of Deino and is a fearsome three-headed dragon.

name: Chespin
desc: Chespin is a Grass type Pokémon known for its prickly nature.

name: Quilladin
desc: Quilladin is the evolved form of Chespin and has a tough, spiky shell.

name: Chesnaught
desc: Chesnaught is the final evolution of Chespin and is a mighty Grass and Fighting type.

name: Fennekin
desc: Fennekin is a Fire type Pokémon known for its fox-like appearance.

name: Braixen
desc: Braixen is the evolved form of Fennekin and wields a fiery branch.

name: Delphox
desc: Delphox is the final evolution of Fennekin and has psychic powers.

name: Froakie
desc: Froakie is a Water type Pokémon known for its quick and agile movements.

name: Frogadier
desc: Frogadier is the evolved form of Froakie and is a skilled ninja frog.

name: Greninja
desc: Greninja is the final evolution of Froakie and is a Water and Dark type.

name: Bunnelby
desc: Bunnelby is a Normal type Pokémon known for its powerful digging abilities.

name: Diggersby
desc: Diggersby is the evolved form of Bunnelby and has strong digging claws.

name: Fletchling
desc: Fletchling is a Normal and Flying type Pokémon known for its cheerful nature.

name: Fletchinder
desc: Fletchinder is the evolved form of Fletchling and has fiery wings.

name: Talonflame
desc: Talonflame is the final evolution of Fletchling and is a fast-flying Fire type.

name: Scatterbug
desc: Scatterbug is a Bug type Pokémon known for its ability to adapt to various environments.

name: Spewpa
desc: Spewpa is the evolved form of Scatterbug and has a protective cocoon.

name: Vivillon
desc: Vivillon is the final evolution of Scatterbug and has stunning wing patterns.

name: Litleo
desc: Litleo is a Fire and Normal type Pokémon known for its fierce roar.

name: Pyroar
desc: Pyroar is a majestic Pokémon known for its fiery mane and regal appearance. It has both Fire and Normal types.

name: Flabébé
desc: Flabébé is a tiny Fairy-type Pokémon often seen holding a flower. It comes in different flower colors.

name: Floette
desc: Floette is the evolved form of Flabébé, still retaining its Fairy type and flower.

name: Florges
desc: Florges is the final evolution of Flabébé and Floette. It's a graceful Fairy-type Pokémon.

name: Skiddo
desc: Skiddo is a Grass-type Pokémon that resembles a young goat. It's known for its playful nature.

name: Gogoat
desc: Gogoat is the evolved form of Skiddo. It's a large Grass-type Pokémon often used for transportation.

name: Pancham
desc: Pancham is a Fighting-type Pokémon with a playful and mischievous personality.

name: Pangoro
desc: Pangoro is the evolved form of Pancham and has both Fighting and Dark types. It has a tough and imposing appearance.

name: Furfrou
desc: Furfrou is a stylish Normal-type Pokémon known for its various grooming styles. It has different appearances based on its style.

name: Espurr
desc: Espurr is a Psychic-type Pokémon with large ears that it uses to sense its surroundings.

name: Meowstic
desc: Meowstic is the evolved form of Espurr. It's a Psychic-type Pokémon with heightened psychic abilities.

name: Honedge
desc: Honedge is a Steel/Ghost-type Pokémon known for its sword-like appearance.

name: Doublade
desc: Doublade is the evolved form of Honedge. It wields two blades and retains its Steel/Ghost typing.

name: Aegislash
desc: Aegislash is a unique Steel/Ghost-type Pokémon that can change forms between Shield and Blade forms.

name: Spritzee
desc: Spritzee is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its sweet fragrance.

name: Aromatisse
desc: Aromatisse is the evolved form of Spritzee. It continues to be a Fairy-type Pokémon.

name: Swirlix
desc: Swirlix is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its love of sweets.

name: Slurpuff
desc: Slurpuff is the evolved form of Swirlix. It remains a Fairy-type Pokémon with a fondness for desserts.

name: Inkay
desc: Inkay is a dual-type Dark/Psychic Pokémon with the ability to change its evolution by leveling up.

name: Malamar
desc: Malamar is the evolved form of Inkay. It's a Dark/Psychic-type Pokémon with strong hypnotic powers.

name: Binacle
desc: Binacle is a dual-type Rock/Water Pokémon that consists of two organisms living together.

name: Barbaracle
desc: Barbaracle is the evolved form of Binacle. It remains a Rock/Water-type Pokémon with formidable claws.

name: Skrelp
desc: Skrelp is a dual-type Poison/Water Pokémon known for its camouflage abilities.

name: Dragalge
desc: Dragalge is the evolved form of Skrelp. It's a unique Poison/Dragon-type Pokémon.

name: Clauncher
desc: Clauncher is a Water-type Pokémon known for its powerful pincer claws.

name: Clawitzer
desc: Clawitzer is the evolved form of Clauncher. It's a Water-type Pokémon with highly pressurized water cannons.

name: Helioptile
desc: Helioptile is a dual-type Electric/Normal Pokémon known for its ability to generate solar energy.

name: Heliolisk
desc: Heliolisk is the evolved form of Helioptile. It's a dual-type Electric/Normal Pokémon with a sun-based ability.

name: Tyrunt
desc: Tyrunt is a dual-type Rock/Dragon Pokémon known for its ancient appearance.

name: Tyrantrum
desc: Tyrantrum is the evolved form of Tyrunt. It's a fearsome Rock/Dragon-type Pokémon.

name: Amaura
desc: Amaura is a dual-type Rock/Ice Pokémon known for its ancient and icy origins.

name: Aurorus
desc: Aurorus is the evolved form of Amaura. It's a majestic Rock/Ice-type Pokémon.

name: Sylveon
desc: Sylveon is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its elegance and strong bond with its Trainer.

name: Hawlucha
desc: Hawlucha is a dual-type Fighting/Flying Pokémon known for its acrobatic fighting style.

name: Dedenne
desc: Dedenne is a dual-type Electric/Fairy Pokémon with a mouse-like appearance.

name: Carbink
desc: Carbink is a dual-type Rock/Fairy Pokémon known for its gem-like body.

name: Goomy
desc: Goomy is a Dragon-type Pokémon known for its slimy and gooey body.

name: Sliggoo
desc: Sliggoo is the evolved form of Goomy. It continues to be a Dragon-type Pokémon.

name: Goodra
desc: Goodra is the evolved form of Sliggoo. It's a Dragon-type Pokémon known for its friendly nature.

name: Klefki
desc: Klefki is a dual-type Steel/Fairy Pokémon known for its keyring-like appearance.

name: Phantump
desc: Phantump is a dual-type Ghost/Grass Pokémon with a tree stump-like appearance.

name: Trevenant
desc: Trevenant is the evolved form of Phantump. It's a Ghost/Grass-type Pokémon known for its haunting presence.

name: Pumpkaboo
desc: Pumpkaboo is a dual-type Ghost/Grass Pokémon known for its pumpkin-like appearance. It has different sizes.

name: Gourgeist
desc: Gourgeist is the evolved form of Pumpkaboo. It's a Ghost/Grass-type Pokémon with different sizes.

name: Bergmite
desc: Bergmite is an Ice-type Pokémon known for its icy body.

name: Avalugg
desc: Avalugg is the evolved form of Bergmite. It's a bulky Ice-type Pokémon.

name: Noibat
desc: Noibat is a dual-type Flying/Dragon Pokémon known for its bat-like appearance.

name: Noivern
desc: Noivern is the evolved form of Noibat. It's a powerful Flying/Dragon-type Pokémon.

name: Xerneas
desc: Xerneas is a Legendary Fairy-type Pokémon known for its connection to life and balance.

name: Yveltal
desc: Yveltal is a Legendary Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its power over destruction and life-draining abilities.

name: Zygarde
desc: Zygarde is a Legendary Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon that acts as a guardian of the ecosystem.

name: Diancie
desc: Diancie is a Mythical Rock/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its dazzling appearance. It can Mega Evolve.

name: Volcanion
desc: Volcanion is a Mythical Fire/Water-type Pokémon known for its steam-producing abilities.

name: Hoopa
desc: Hoopa is a Mythical Psychic/Ghost-type Pokémon with the ability to change forms.
